text: Joseph E. "Jeb" Bradley III (born October 20, 1952) is an American politician. He is a member of the Republican Party. He has been a member of the New Hampshire Senate since 2009. He was a member of the New Hampshire House of Representatives from 1990 to 2000. He then was the U.S. representative for from 2003 to 2007. He was Majority Leader of the New Hampshire Senate from 2010 to 2018 and again from 2020 to 2022. In 2022, Bradley became the President of the New Hampshire Senate. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the New Hampshire General Court Category:United States representatives from New Hampshire Category:Politicians from Maine Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Jeb Bradley
